类 AbstractIOConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonf.core.session.AbstractIOConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IOConfig
    直接已知子类:

    public abstract class AbstractIOConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOConfig
    Base implementation of IOConfig

    • 方法详细资料

      • getReadBufferSize

        public int getReadBufferSize()
        指定者:
        getReadBufferSize 在接口中 IOConfig
        返回:
        the size of the read buffer that I/O processor used for session's read operation. The default size is 2048 bytes

      • setReadBufferSize

        public void setReadBufferSize(int readBufferSize)
        Sets the size of the read buffer that I/O processor used for session's read operation
        指定者:
        setReadBufferSize 在接口中 IOConfig
        参数:
        readBufferSize - The size of the read buffer

      • getMaxWriteBytes

        public int getMaxWriteBytes()
        指定者:
        getMaxWriteBytes 在接口中 IOConfig
        返回:
        limitation for the number of written bytes per flush the default value is calculated automatically based on the default readBufferSize for read-write fairness

      • setMaxWriteBytes

        public void setMaxWriteBytes(int maxWriteBytes)
        Set limitation for the number of written bytes for read-write fairness
        指定者:
        setMaxWriteBytes 在接口中 IOConfig
        参数:
        maxWriteBytes - The maximum write bytes

      • getReceiveBufferSize

        public abstract int getReceiveBufferSize()

      • getIdleTimeInMillis

        public long getIdleTimeInMillis(IdleStatus status)
        指定者:
        getIdleTimeInMillis 在接口中 IOConfig
        参数:
        status - The status for which we want the idle time (One of READER_IDLE, WRITER_IDLE or BOTH_IDLE)
        返回:
        idle time for the specified type of idleness in milliseconds.

      • setIdleTimeInMillis

        public void setIdleTimeInMillis(IdleStatus status,
                                long idleTimeInMillis)
        Sets idle time for the specified type of idleness in seconds.
        指定者:
        setIdleTimeInMillis 在接口中 IOConfig
        参数:
        status - The status for which we want to set the idle time (One of READER_IDLE, WRITER_IDLE or BOTH_IDLE)
        idleTimeInMillis - The time in millisecond to set
